text: Love, How Bad You Are () is a 1953 Mexican crime film directed by José Díaz Morales and starring Emilio Tuero, Emilia Guiú and José María Linares- Rivas.Pierce p.398 ==Cast== * Emilio Tuero as Carlos Durán * Emilia Guiú as Norka Olguín * José María Linares-Rivas as El filántropo * Evangelina Elizondo as Lilia de la Cueva * Arturo Martínez as Gángter * Mario Ruiz Armengol as Johnny * Rosario Gálvez * Luis Aragón as Jefe de policía * Eduardo Acuña as Bartender * Manuel Casanueva * Rogelio Fernández * José Luis Rojas == References == == Bibliography == * David Pierce. Motion Picture Copyrights & Renewals, 1950-1959. Milestone, 1989. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1953 crime films Category:Mexican crime films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films directed by José Díaz Morales
title: Love, How Bad You Are
